question: Which Indian youngster has been chosen for UN â€“ 2020 cohort of young leaders for the Sustainable Development Goals?
explanation:
An 18-year-old Indian youngster Udit Singhal has been named by the United Nations to the 2020 cohort of young leaders for the Sustainable Development Goals.
Udit Singhal is the founder of Glass2Sand which is a zero-waste ecosystem that addresses the problem of glass waste in Delhi.
